OUR TIME WIND QUINTET

This time, right now, with you is Our Time

About Us

Our Time Wind Quintet invites you in.

Through intentional and purposeful programming, Our Time offers a moment for attendees to reconnect with their simple but profound capacity to listen and hold space for each other.

The group aspires to share their joyous spirit through performance, educational engagement, and community partnerships. Our Time opens dialogues to weave together a more supportive humanity.

CURRENT PROJECTS

Check out what Our Time Wind Quintet is up to:

Latest Recording

Listen to Our Time Quintet's recent recording of Valerie Coleman's "Umoja."

Upcoming Performance

Our Time Quintet is honored to be a part of Natalie Vargas Nedvetsky's Literary Music Series on November 6, 2020. We are excited to collaborate with fictional writer and poet Patricia McCrystal.

Educational Engagement

Stay tuned for Our Time Quintet's Musical Storytime programming.

Collaborations

New collaborations are underway. Interested in collaborating with us? Let's set up a exploratory converstation! Email us at ourtimequintet@gmail.com.
